SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Would You Say Your Health Is
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - In general, would you say your health is:
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Rate Your Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Health Now Compared to 1 Year Ago
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health in general now?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Rate Your Health Compared to One Year Ago

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Vigorous Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Moderate Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Lifting or carrying groceries.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Lifting Groceries

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Climbing several flights of stairs.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Climbing Several Flights

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Climbing one flight of stairs.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Climbing One Flight

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Bending, kneeling, or stooping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Bending or Stooping

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Health Limit Walk More Than Mile
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking more than a mile.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking More Than A Mile

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking several blocks.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking Several Blocks

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking one block.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking One Block

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Bathing or dressing yourself.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Health Limit Bathing or Dressing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Physical Health Cut Down Time Spent on Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Accomplished less than you would like.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Physical Health Accomplished Less

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Phys Health: Limit Kind of Work
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Physical Health Limited in the Kind of Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Had difficulty performing the work or other activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Physical Health Difficulty Performing Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Cut Down Time Spent on Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Accomplished less than you would like.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Accomplished Less

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Did Not Do Work as Carefully

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Extend Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interfere With Social Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Bodily Pain

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Did Pain Interfere With Your Work
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Did You Feel Full of Pep
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel full of pep?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Feel Full of Pep

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Have Been a Very Nervous Person
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a very nervous person?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Been a Nervous Person

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Have Felt So Down in the Dumps
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Felt Nothing Could Cheer You Up

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt calm and peaceful?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Felt Calm and Peaceful

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you have a lot of energy?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Have a Lot of Energy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt downhearted and blue?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Felt Downhearted and Blue

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel worn out?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Feel Worn Out

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Have You Been a Happy Person
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a happy person?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Been a Happy Person

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel tired?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Feel Tired

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Time Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interfere With Social Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-Get Sick Easier Than Other People
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I seem to get sick a little easier than other people.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Get Sick Easier Than Other

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I am as healthy as anybody I know.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - As Healthy as Anybody

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: R3601-I Expect My Health to Get Worse
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I expect my health to get worse.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - Expect Health to Get Worse

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: My health is excellent.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: RAND-36 - My Health is Excellent
